topic.title: 2.2.1 Emergency Stop Switch Is Pressed During Tool Change (ATC) Operation

header.para: Emergency Stop Switch Is Pressed During Tool Change (ATC) Operation

body.para: If the Emergency Stop switch is pressed during an Automatic Tool Changer (ATC) operation, all functions will shut down immediately even if the emergency is not related to the ATC operation.
When ATC is not in home position, axis feed will remain prohibited and M06 commanded tool exchanges will not be performed.
Perform the following procedure when recovering from Emergency Stop condition.

table.style: width:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:8px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Exercise extreme care when recovering the machine from the Emergency Stop condition as serious accidents may occur.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: When working with other personnel, maintain clear communication at all times to prevent serious injury.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Contact your Makino service representative for assistance if serious damage to the machine has occurred.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: If operation cannot be recovered using the manual recovery procedure, do NOT attempt to solve the problem. Contact your Makino service representative for assistance.

body.para: If ATC process is interrupted, it can be recovered automatically by ATC Recovery function.
Carry out the following procedure to retrieve from interruption.

list.style: text-indent:-29px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:29px; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;
list.li: Release the Emergency Stop condition by rotating the Emergency Stop switch in the direction indicated by the arrows to release the lock.
Alarm message “A156 ATC CYCLE WAS INTERRUPTED RECOVER USING ATC RECOVERY IN MAINTENANCE MODE” is generated.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Press Makino icon and Main Menu screen is displayed.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-indent:-29px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:29px; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;
list.li: ATC Maintenance Screen is displayed. (Refer to Figure 2.1 ATC Recovery Screen)

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Move cursor to ATC Recovery and press

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: A message “PUSH ONE TOUCH START FOR ATC RECOVERY” is displayed at the bottom line of the screen.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: switch on the main operation panel. ATC Recovery program will be automatically called and executed. ATC will be brought to a state of standby (ready for operation).

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-29px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:29px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
